events.name: A peek into industrial 3D printing, and 3D scanning and printing
events.description: We will have an expert who will share insights on metal 3D printing with industrial technology! ....and what's a hacker meetup without cool hacks! Yes, we will try 3D scanning a pair of glasses and replicating it by 3D printing :))

events.name: Apple Watch pairing and user experience
events.description: To get members to share experience in using Apple watch with iPhone 5 and above.
events.location: TCC, POMO, 1 Selegie Road #01-02 & #02-25 PoMo, 188306, Singapore

events.name: Hackerspace Cool Geeks meetup: Hackware and Diybio special
events.description: Shingo Hisakawa is in town! Shingo is an extremely prolific software/hardware maker/engineer. He happened to be in town and we are not letting him leave until we hear about his latest updates on his open source hardware project that enables affordable and portable DIY polymerase chain reaction. This is his attempt to help bring diybio to the masses for experimentation and education At the same time, we will also have a brief show and tell/preview of the Delta Bob, a 3d printer painstakingly handmade in HackerspaceSG by Bob Chow Loong Jin. Note this is a short showcase of the alpha version! https://www.facebook.com/HackerspaceSG/photos/a.10151933064748104.1073741825.189278128103/10153409467783104/?type=1 References: TEDx talk tedxtokyo.com/en/talk/shingo-hisakawa/ [Hardware] Manpowered aircraft https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U1RoO-pmLh4 Bluetooth DIY Doorlock https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HvzMfl9nb2g Nixie timer as first PCB https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g9wKrPbfEOc DNA amplifier for smartphone https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWryZYt0-gU [Software] Kinect Boobs https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dxRvRbPtmKo Space Station tracker Argumented Reality app https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FJzkDU3bmec Bluetooth Space station notifier pendant https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2_iN12wnlh4
